infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: RoadLedger needs your location to track trip mileage by state for IFTA compliance.

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: RoadLedger needs background location access to accurately track your trips even when the app is in the background.
